teacher_info.intro:
Hi! I´m Ester. If you are looking for an enthusiastic and devoted Spanish tutor with excellent communication skills, you are in the right profile. I am passionate about languages, I love to travel and I currently live abroad, so I really enjoy teaching the Spanish language and culture to my students. 
Hola! Soy Ester. Si estás buscando un tutor de español que aporte dedicación y entusiasmo a sus clases, has dado con el perfil adecuado. Me apasionan los idiomas, me encanta viajar y ahora mismo vivo fuera de España, por lo que disfruto mucho enseñando el idioma y la cultura española a mis estudiantes.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi! I´m Ester. If you are looking for an enthusiastic and devoted Spanish tutor with excellent communication skills, you are in the right profile. I am passionate about languages, I love to travel and I currently live abroad, so I really enjoy teaching the Spanish language and culture to my students. 
Hola! Soy Ester. Si estás buscando un tutor de español que aporte dedicación y entusiasmo a sus clases, has dado con el perfil adecuado. Me apasionan los idiomas, me encanta viajar y ahora mismo vivo fuera de España, por lo que disfruto mucho enseñando el idioma y la cultura española a mis estudiantes.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am specialized in Communication and I try to find the best approach to Spanish depending on the student´s needs and personality. I like to be dynamic and give useful content. Besides a tutor, I am still a student, that´s why I have a better understanding of what a pupil is looking for while learning a new language.
Estoy especializada en Comunicación y trato de buscar la mejor aproximación en función de las necesidades y características del alumno. Me gusta ser dinámica y ofrecer contenido útil. Además de tutora, soy también estudiante y por esta razón puedo entender qué es lo que busca un alumno cuando está aprendiendo una lengua.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Let´s talk about your goals, what you are interested in and define a learning plan. I always offer tailor made lessons: from a relaxed conversation between pals to a grammar focused session. I use a wide variety of resources: videos, articles, textbooks, exercises, songs... We will work on the different aspects of language skills (speaking, reading, listening and writing) until you have mastered Spanish .
Hablemos de tus objetivos para definir un plan de aprendizaje. Utilizo un amplio abanico de recursos: videos, artículos, libros de texto, ejercicios, canciones... Trabajaremos la conversación, la comprensión, la escritura y la lectura, hasta que domines el español.

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish is Fun
pro_course_detail.description:
Learn Spanish in a dynamic way while developing skills in communication, reading, writing and listening.
Aprende español de una manera dinámica al mismo tiempo que desarrollas tus capacidad de comunicación, lectura, escritura y comprensión.

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish chit-chat
pro_course_detail.description:
Let´s talk and learn Spanish while we have a lovely chat. Dive into the Spanish language and culture and get a better understanding through conversation. 
Hablemos y aprendamos español mientras charlamos. Sumérgete en la lengua y cultura españolas y consigue dominar el idioma a través de la conversación.

teacher_info.intro:
Proud to be Colombian. I am passionate about science and astronomy. At the moment I am an engineering student and I have various social projects where I save street animals and help vulnerable populations.

I love learning about other cultures and seeing people happy. Nothing will make me happy more than to help you master my language and culture for which I have total affection and love
teacher_info.about_me:
Proud to be Colombian. I am passionate about science and astronomy. At the moment I am an engineering student and I have various social projects where I save street animals and help vulnerable populations.

I love learning about other cultures and seeing people happy. Nothing will make me happy more than to help you master my language and culture for which I have total affection and love
teacher_info.about_teacher: Patience and dedication describe me when I teach my classes. With all possible resources we will achieve the best level of Spanish together. I like to understand the strengths of each student in order to enhance learning from that reference.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I like to use graphic, sound and analytical resources during class and leave fun little tasks for the following classes. Always with a slight theoretical component and a high practice component.

pro_course_detail.title: Bienvenido(a) al mundo del español - Welcome to the spanish World
pro_course_detail.description:
Este paquete esta planeado para personas que están iniciando con el idioma español. En cada clase se establecerá un orden de aprendizaje tanto teórico como práctico que te dará las bases necesarias para avanzar en el idioma. Para cada estudiante prepararé un plan de estudios que se adecúe al progreso e interés de cada estudiante.
*/
This package is planned for people who are starting with the Spanish language. In each class, a theoretical and practical learning order will be established that will give you the necessary bases to advance in the language. For each student I will prepare a study plan that is based on the progress and interest of each student.

pro_course_detail.title: Recorriendo el mundo del español -  Navigating the world of Spanish
pro_course_detail.description:
Este curso está preparado para estudiantes que tienen un dominio intermedio y avanzado del idioma. Acá vamos a reforzar la lectura, la escritura, la pronunciación y la conversación. Vamos a aprender a generar conversaciones más profundas y realizaremos actividades que brinden mayor léxico para lograr una mejor fluidez a la hora de hablar. El método que utilizaremos será una combinación de practica gramatical y teoría conversacional. Además se realizará un seguimiento al estudiante para adecuar las clases acorde a su progreso y a su interés.
*/
This course is prepared for students who have an intermediate or complete use of the language. Here we are going to reinforce reading, writing, pronunciation and conversation. We will learn to generate deeper conversations and we will carry out activities that provide greater vocabulary to achieve better fluency at the moment of speak. The method we will use will be a combination of grammar practice and conversational theory. In addition, the student will be monitored to adapt the classes according to their progress and interest.

pro_course_detail.title: Viviendo en el mundo del español - Living in the Spanish world
pro_course_detail.description:
Este curso va dirigido a estudiantes que desean interactuar con el idioma para perfeccionar y practicar. Durante las clases repasaremos lectura, escritura, conversación, pronunciación y ampliaremos aún más el vocabulario.  El método que usaremos se basa en ejercicios de conversación para así generar una familiarización con el idioma. La conversación será oral y escrita.
*/
This course is aimed at students who want to interact with the language to improve and practice. During the classes we will review reading, writing, conversation, pronunciation and we will expand the vocabulary even more. The method that we will use is based on conversation exercises in order to generate affinity with the language. The conversation will be oral and written.

teacher_info.intro: Hi. My name is Lisa Celis. I am 21 years old. I live in Cúcuta, a small city in Colombia on the border with Venezuela. I love playing tennis, reading, writing, and  watching series because I am currently learning English and it is a good listening exercise. Five years ago I started teaching Spanish, English and social Sciences to children in my country. Since then I have always liked teaching. I am a fourth year law student at the university of Pamplona. ​​If you would like to talk about related legal issues and express them properly in the legal field. It will be a pleasure to help you.
teacher_info.about_me: Hi. My name is Lisa Celis. I am 21 years old. I live in Cúcuta, a small city in Colombia on the border with Venezuela. I love playing tennis, reading, writing, and  watching series because I am currently learning English and it is a good listening exercise. Five years ago I started teaching Spanish, English and social Sciences to children in my country. Since then I have always liked teaching. I am a fourth year law student at the university of Pamplona. ​​If you would like to talk about related legal issues and express them properly in the legal field. It will be a pleasure to help you.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
“formadoras  de formadores” ese es el lema del colegio del que me gradué. El cual tiene como misión la formación de docentes.  Por lo cual he tenido la oportunidad  de ejercer la docencia, con niños entre las edades de 5 a 10 años.  
Actualmente estudio derecho, por lo tanto tengo facilidad al expresarme ya sea de forma oral o escrita.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Todas las personas tienen un estilo propio de aprendizaje, es por eso que planearé las lecciones con base a las necesidades de cada estudiante, como se sienta más cómodo. 
Mis clases serán flexibles, por si el estudiante prefiere hablar de algún  tema en específico. Tendré preparado distinto material de apoyo para que el estudiante pueda practicar incluso cuando la lección haya terminado. 
Y por supuesto, me gustaría recibir críticas constructivas para poder mejorar mis clases.

pro_course_detail.title: LECCIONES
pro_course_detail.description: Me parece muy importante como tutor, adaptarme a los procesos de aprendizaje de cada estudiante, por eso te preguntare con anterioridad: ¿cual es tu motivación para aprender el idioma? ¿Cual es tu nivel de comprensión? ¿Qué te gustaría reforzar? para poder preparar la lección a tu gusto.

pro_course_detail.title: Español para niños/ For kids.
pro_course_detail.description: Antes de convertirme en profesora online, solía ser profesora de niños en algunos colegios de latinoamérica. Es por eso que me encanta enseñar español a niños, pues pienso que los primeros años de vida, son el mejor momento para aprender un nuevo idioma.  Si tu hijo tiene entre 5 y 11 años, estas lecciones serán muy útiles en el desarrollo de su formación académica.  Pues tus hijos aprenderán mientras se divierten. Ya que en el caso de los niños, el juego es la mejor manera para aprender un nuevo idioma.

teacher_info.intro:
Hola! Me llamo Rosario y soy de México, soy una persona responsable y amigable. Me gusta aprender idiomas así como también las culturas de algunos países. Tiendo a platicar mucho, así que podemos platicar de lo que sea! Me gusta ayudar a las personas cuando tienen algún problema hablando español.
----
Hello! My name is Rosario and I am from Mexico, I am friendly person. I like to learn languages as well as the cultures of some countries. I tend to talk a lot, so we can talk about whatever you want! I like to help people when they have a problem speaking Spanish.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hola! Me llamo Rosario y soy de México, soy una persona responsable y amigable. Me gusta aprender idiomas así como también las culturas de algunos países. Tiendo a platicar mucho, así que podemos platicar de lo que sea! Me gusta ayudar a las personas cuando tienen algún problema hablando español.
----
Hello! My name is Rosario and I am from Mexico, I am friendly person. I like to learn languages as well as the cultures of some countries. I tend to talk a lot, so we can talk about whatever you want! I like to help people when they have a problem speaking Spanish.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Me considero una persona confiable, por lo tanto no debes sentirte avergonzado si cometes errores, al contrario, daré lo mejor de mi para que puedas mejorar tu pronunciación y gramática. 
Puede que sea tedioso estudiar español, pero no es imposible. 
No preparo estudiantes para exámenes.
----
I consider myself a trustworthy person, therefore you should not feel ashamed if you make mistakes, on the contrary, I will do my best so that you can improve your pronunciation and grammar.
It may be tedious to study Spanish, but it is not impossible.
I don't prepare students for exams.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Puedes platicarme de lo que quieras, para que yo pueda escuchar si tienes algún pequeño error. 
También puedo ayudarte en tus ejercicios que tengas, mejorar pronunciación y acento.
Aclarar dudas que tengas sobre el idioma.
----
You can talk to me about whatever you want, so I can listen if you have some mistakes.
Also I can help you in your exercises that you have, improve your pronunciation and accent.
Clarify doubts you have about the language.

pro_course_detail.title: Hablemos en español
pro_course_detail.description:
¡Hola! Me llamo Rosy y puedo ayudarte a practicar tu nivel de español. Por favor siéntete en confianza de tener una conversación de lo que sea. Puedes decirme cualquier duda que tengas. No te preocupes si cometes errores, porque con todo gusto estoy aquí para guiarte.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hello! My name is Rosy and I can help you practicing your spanish level. Please feel free to have a conversation about whatever you want. You can ask me any questions you have. Don't worry if you make mistakes, because it's a pleasure tu guide you.

teacher_info.intro:
Soy una persona tranquila y de mente abierta a la que le gusta aprender cosas. Me encanta cocinar, cantar y bailar ... estar en la naturaleza y disfrutar de las cosas sencillas de la vida :)

I'm an open minded and chill person that loves to learn about things. I love to cook, sing and dance...to be in nature and enjoy simple things of life :)
teacher_info.short_signature: Expresión y Comunicación Efectiva en Español
teacher_info.about_me:
Soy una persona tranquila y de mente abierta a la que le gusta aprender cosas. Me encanta cocinar, cantar y bailar ... estar en la naturaleza y disfrutar de las cosas sencillas de la vida :)

I'm an open minded and chill person that loves to learn about things. I love to cook, sing and dance...to be in nature and enjoy simple things of life :)
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Muy paciente y comprensiva; ¡Estamos aquí para disfrutar en el proceso!
Creo que aprender a través de formas naturales, como la conversación, ayuda a los estudiantes a mejorar más rápido y más fácilmente. Entonces usaremos muchas discusiones y formas interactivas en las clases.

Very patient and understanding; we're here to enjoy the process! 
I believe that learning through natural ways, like conversation, helps students improve faster and easier. So we will use many discussions and interactive ways in the classes.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My lessons are customized based on your interests and goals. I typically suggest conversation topics, videos, articles or other materials which include different phrasing and vocabulary. Through those conversations, I will be able to correct your speech, pronunciation and writing. 
My classes have a relaxed environment where we both can share and be ourselves.
Personally, I feel that learning a second language has been a very important experience, and many new perspectives, opportunities and relationships came through it. I will keep the classes light and fun, and encourage you to keep moving ahead :)

pro_course_detail.title: Español efectivo: 'CONVERSACIÓN, LECTURA Y ESCRITURA'
pro_course_detail.description:
En esta metodologia usaremos discusiones acerca de tematicas y situaciones actuales con el fin de perfeccionar tu fluidez, vocabulario y pronunciación. Las clases se estructuran en base a intereses personales o temas sociales relevantes donde podras aportar una perspectiva personal al respecto, fortaleciendo tu proceso de pensamiento en la lengua y confidencia.

In this methodology we will use discussions about current topics and situations in order to improve your fluency, vocabulary and pronunciation. Classes are structured based on personal interests or relevant social issues where you can provide a personal perspective on the matter, strengthening your thought process in the language and confidence.

pro_course_detail.title: Vamos! Español para viajes ✈
pro_course_detail.description:
Durante estas sesiones te ayudare a expresar tus ideas y pensamientos, trabajaremos en la conversacion de temas de importancia que te permitan acercarte a la cultura latinoamericana, como vocabulario y expresiones que te permitan una comunicacion mas efectiva con los nativos, a la vez que alcanzamos una correcta pronunciacion. Las clases se basan en las metas y el nivel de cada estudiante.

During these sessions I will help you express your ideas and thoughts, we will work on the conversation of important topics that allow you to get closer to the Latin American culture, such as vocabulary and expressions that allow you to communicate more effectively with the natives, at the same time that we achieve a correct pronunciation. Classes are based on the goals and level of each student.

teacher_info.intro: hello im johel ferrer fuguet from falcon venezuela. spanish is on fashion nowadays , and not only that , remmenber that spanish is a romantic language , dare yourself to say fluently te quiero and steal some glances. lets work on your pronunciation .
teacher_info.introduction:
Hello my name is johel ferrer .I’m from falcon Venezuela. I’ve just read about this new website italki, which got me so excited because it brings me the opportunity to share my knowledge about Spanish grammar and at the same time to learn new English vocabulary and many other languages as well. I’ve got a huge background experience as an English teacher for English learners , and during that process I’ve found out that i love teaching and learning languages because language skills win friends , open doors , give you options . In this particular case I’m here to offer you my help in your learning process. And if you stumbled over the subjective in your high school Spanish class, Take heart all you need to do is practice as much as you can to master it. Don’t hesitate anymore book a class with me, you won’t regret. Hope to see you soon! 

Hola mi nombre es Johel Ferrer soy de Falcón, VENEZUELA. Me he enterado de esta nueva página italki, la cual me tiene muy emocionado porque me brinda la oportunidad de compartir mis conocimientos acerca de la gramática española y al mismo tiempo aprender nuevo vocabulario inglés y muchos idiomas también. He tenido una gran experiencia como profesor de inglés para estudiantes del idioma ingles y durante ese proceso descubrí que me encanta enseñar y aprender idiomas, porque las habilidades lingüísticas te hacen ganar amigos, te abren puertas y te dan opciones. En este caso particular estoy aquí para ofrecerte mi ayuda en tu proceso de aprendizaje del idioma español. Y si tenías dificultades con el sujeto en tus clases de español en la secundaria, no te desanimes. Todo lo que tú necesitas es practicar tanto como sea posible para mejorarlo y es por esa razón que te ofrezco mi ayuda para hacer más fácil tu proceso de aprendizaje.
teacher_info.about_me: hello im johel ferrer fuguet from falcon venezuela. spanish is on fashion nowadays , and not only that , remmenber that spanish is a romantic language , dare yourself to say fluently te quiero and steal some glances. lets work on your pronunciation .

pro_course_detail.title: conversation in spanish
pro_course_detail.description: You will be able to practice your grammar skills and more here. this conversation will be about any topic in spanish, I will test you out while you learn with me.

teacher_info.intro:
Hola! 
My name is Vicenta and I am a Spanish teacher. I live on a famous tranquil lake called Lago Atitlán in Guatemala. I taught private lessons locally and now through Italki am able to connect to rest of the world.  I enjoy teaching both my native languages, seeing my students advance and sharing my culture.
teacher_info.introduction:
Currently the new Italki classroom doesn't work with ipads or tablets. I won''t be able to teach with the new beta program.

Hola! 
My name is Vicenta and I am a Spanish teacher from Guatemala. Where I live, most people learn Spanish as a second language. Because of this, our accent is very clear, neutral and has a pleasing cadence. Our Spanish is slower, deliberate and we pronounce all the letters, which is a kinder transition for beginners and a more universal foundation. I have taught Spanish (one on one) locally for 7 years. I enjoy sharing my language, culture and seeing my students advance. My method of teaching is a positive balance of patience and structure. Everyone has a preferred learning style and I can tailor my approach to you. I am new at teaching online and excited to share my experience to a broader community. I look forward to hearing from you :) 

Vicenta 

¡Hola! 
Mi nombre es Vicenta y soy maestra guatemalteca de español. Donde yo vivo la mayoría de la gente aprende el español como una segunda lengua. Debido a ésto nuestro acento es bastante claro, neutro y con una agradable cadencia. Nuestro español es pausado, deliberado y pronunciamos todas las letras. Esto ofrece una suave transición para los principiantes y sienta bases sólidas. He enseñado español de manera individual por los ultimos once años. Me gusta compartir mi lengua, mi cultura y ver cómo mis estudiantes avanzan. Mi metodo de enseñanza es un balance entre la paciencia y la estructura. Sé que cada uno tenemos nuestro propio estilo de aprendizaje por lo que puedo diseñar el más apropiado para usted. Enseñar en línea es algo nuevo para mí y me entusiasma poder compartir mi experiencia con una comunidad más amplia. Espero tener prontas noticias suyas, 

Vicenta.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hola! 
My name is Vicenta and I am a Spanish teacher. I live on a famous tranquil lake called Lago Atitlán in Guatemala. I taught private lessons locally and now through Italki am able to connect to rest of the world.  I enjoy teaching both my native languages, seeing my students advance and sharing my culture.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I have taught Spanish locally for 9 years. Where I live most people speak Tz'utujil at home and Spanish out of the house. The Guatemalan Spanish accent is very clear, neutral and has a pleasing cadence. It is slower, deliberate and we pronounce all the letters, which is a kinder transition for beginners and a more universal foundation around the world.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My teaching style is based on many hours of real time experience with people of all levels. It is difficult to fake teaching one on one. You, the student, can feel if you have advanced or not. 
We find the level you are at and move form there. We continue with a new lesson and integrate that into your previous knowledge. I try to have lots of conversation, keeping engaging discussions with topics that are relevant to you and the new material. The more engaged everyone is, the easier it is to retain new information. With this approach there is no pressure and when you read my comments you'll see I approach every student with care, patience and kindness.

pro_course_detail.title: Formal Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description: We begin with me assessing where your Spanish is. I have a lot of experience teaching Spanish at my local school and with Italki and have a break down of where to start or continue from. From there I keep notes and pay attention to you and each time we have I lesson we review and continue on your journey to a new language. I can help you with grammar, homework, vocabulary, conversation and anything else you might need.

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring Tz'utujil
pro_course_detail.description:
Tz'utujil is my local Mayan language. It is spoken at home and tied to our culture and traditions. My husband and I are proud to teach our children and continue speaking it at home. I would love the opportunity to share a part of my unique culture and heritage. 
Vicenta

teacher_info.intro:
¡Hola! soy Mariana y nací y crecí en Venezuela. Disfruto aprender idiomas nuevas y descubrir culturas distintas a la mía, por eso estoy cursando una licenciatura en Idiomas Modernos. También me gusta leer y las manualidades. Me encanta conversar sobre temas relacionados a la cultura, como el arte, la historia y la literatura.  
Hey! My name is Mariana and I was born and raised in Venezuela. I enjoy learning new languages and discovering cultures different to my own, that's why I'm studying an undergraduate degree in Modern Languages. I also like reading and crafting. I love to talk about all things related to culture, like art, history and literature.
teacher_info.about_me:
¡Hola! soy Mariana y nací y crecí en Venezuela. Disfruto aprender idiomas nuevas y descubrir culturas distintas a la mía, por eso estoy cursando una licenciatura en Idiomas Modernos. También me gusta leer y las manualidades. Me encanta conversar sobre temas relacionados a la cultura, como el arte, la historia y la literatura.  
Hey! My name is Mariana and I was born and raised in Venezuela. I enjoy learning new languages and discovering cultures different to my own, that's why I'm studying an undergraduate degree in Modern Languages. I also like reading and crafting. I love to talk about all things related to culture, like art, history and literature.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Tengo un par de meses de experiencia como tutora; pero es mi experiencia personal aprendiendo idiomas lo que me permite acompañar a mis estudiantes en su aprendizaje del Español. Soy paciente y te ayudaré a mejorar tu comprensión auditiva y a practicar tus habilidades de conversación. 
I have a couple of months of experience as a tutor; but it's my personal experience as a language learner that allows me to accompany my students in their Spanish learning process. I'm patient and I'll help you improve your listening comprehension and to practice your conversation skills.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Mis clases son de conversación informal. Durante nuestra sesión escogeremos un tema tu interés, te ayudaré a practicar y desarrollar tu vocabulario de temas específicos, corregiré tus errores de pronunciación y resolveré tus dudas ¡Espero verte pronto!.
My classes are informal conversation based. During our session we'll choose a topic of your interest, I'll help you practice and develop vocabulary of specific topics, I'll correct your pronunciation mistakes and solve your doubts. Hope to see you soon!

pro_course_detail.title: ¡Hablemos!- Let's talk!
pro_course_detail.description:
¡Hola, futuro estudiante!
  Te ayudaré a practicar tus habilidades de conversación en español. Podemos conversar de cualquier tema relacionado a tus intereses, puede ser sobre aprender idiomas, libros, películas, series, historia, cultura, viajes, arte, tu rutina diaria... sólo déjame saber antes. Aquí practicarás tu pronunciación, desarrollarás tu fluidez en español y aprenderás vocabulario nuevo de forma relajada y divertida. No dudes en escribirme si tienes alguna duda. ¡Te espero!
Hello there, future student!
 I'll help you practice your conversation skills in Spanish. We can talk about any subject related to your interests, it may be language learning, books, movies, shows, history, culture, traveling, art, your daily routine... just let me know beforehand. Here you'll practice your pronunciation, develop your fluency in Spanish and learn new vocabulary in a relaxed and fun way. Feel free to message me if you have any doubts. Hope to see you soon!

teacher_info.intro:
My name is Maite and I’m from Barcelona.
I'm a Spanish philologist , proofreader, web text writer and Spanish teacher.  
I like teaching very much and I enjoy a lot helping people to enjoy Spanish language. 
I like my city and I like to travel around the world when it’s possible for me.
I think that knowing other places you can open your mind to the world, so I like knowing about the other cultures very much.
I’m passionate about reading and I also, enjoy watching films and series in Netflix, walking on the beach or spend time with my family and my friends.
teacher_info.about_me:
My name is Maite and I’m from Barcelona.
I'm a Spanish philologist , proofreader, web text writer and Spanish teacher.  
I like teaching very much and I enjoy a lot helping people to enjoy Spanish language. 
I like my city and I like to travel around the world when it’s possible for me.
I think that knowing other places you can open your mind to the world, so I like knowing about the other cultures very much.
I’m passionate about reading and I also, enjoy watching films and series in Netflix, walking on the beach or spend time with my family and my friends.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I want you feel comfortable when we are in class. 
I would like to begin with the basic questions to know what your level is and speak about the topics which you prefer.
Feeling well and being relaxed is a perfect way to learn.
If you need to improve or understand grammar we will work on it. Together we can work on improving your pronunciation, reading and writing skills by using a variety of tasks. 
If you are more interested in speaking I will help you to speak correctly while we have a nice talk. We can choose topics and just talk and comment expressions and vocabulary. 
I would like very much that you tell me what your preferences and interests are, and we will work on that.
¡Thank you!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My classes are based in speaking and from here we are going to know what level of Spanish you have.
I can help you from basic level learning to answer simple questions and been able to build sentences. 
If you need more level and you want to read or write I can also assist you. If you are preparing a Spanish test level, I will help you too with materials and more practice to do by yourself if you want even as homework.
We are going to speak and use it to correct mistakes and learn new things.
I recommend you begin with the "trial lesson" in order that we know each other and what do you expect.
So, are you ready?

exp_info.description:
He ayudado a niños y a adolescentes a preparar su temario de lengua española tanto a nivel lingüístico como gramatical.
Creo que es muy importante el contacto con la lengua y la experiencia de explicar cómo se habla una lengua, porque usamos unas palabras y no otras, como construimos las frases y darles recursos y trucos para aprender y conseguir tener una comprensión y un conocimiento suficientes para construir unas buenas bases y además poder aprobar sus exámenes.

edu_info.description:
Estudié Filología Española y me especialicé en Literatura y lengua española de la edad moderna.
Después me preparé como correctora de estilo literario y he hecho cursos de preparación para escritura online.

cert_info.certificate: Licenciatura en Filología española

pro_course_detail.title: EL ESPAÑOL QUE NECESITES
pro_course_detail.description:
Ya hablas un poco de español y sabes utilizar el presente y el pasado.
Aprenderemos a utilizar el futuro, te enseñaré a comunicarte bien  y practicaremos para que puedas  mantener conversaciones de temas generales, familiares o específicos que necesites.
También podemos aprender a escribir una carta y a redactar textos, mejorar tu gramática o leer.

pro_course_detail.title: CONVERSACIÓN
pro_course_detail.description:
Clase totalmente oral.  
Descubriremos cuál es tu nivel y practicaremos con conversaciones sobre los temas que te interesen. Legarás a expresarte correctamente de una forma ágil.
A la vez aprenderás nuevo vocabulario que te ayudará a mejorar la comprensión del español.

pro_course_detail.title: PACKS  AHORRO EL ESPAÑOL  QUE NECESITES . 5 o 10 clases. 30 minutos o 60 minutos.
pro_course_detail.description: Hablaremos sobre los temas que más te interesen y a la vez aprenderás a defenderte por el mundo en español. Resolveré tus dudas de vocabulario, gramática y lo que te preocupe.

pro_course_detail.title: PACK AHORRO CONVERSACIÓN.  5 o 10 clases. 30 o 60 minutos.
pro_course_detail.description:
Vamos a pasar un buen rato hablando en español mientras aprendes nuevo vocabulario y expresiones.
We are going to enjoy talking in Spanish learning while you learn new vocabulary and expressions.

teacher_info.intro: Hola ¿Cómo están? Mi nombre es Estephany Becerra, soy estudiante de licenciatura en literatura, soy una persona muy curiosa, lo cual me permite tener cierto conocimiento general de aspectos culturales e históricos. Me gusta descubrir y aprender cosas nuevas, aún más si tienen que ver con otras culturas. Me gusta mucho la comida, los animales, los idiomas, leer, escuchar música.
teacher_info.about_me: Hola ¿Cómo están? Mi nombre es Estephany Becerra, soy estudiante de licenciatura en literatura, soy una persona muy curiosa, lo cual me permite tener cierto conocimiento general de aspectos culturales e históricos. Me gusta descubrir y aprender cosas nuevas, aún más si tienen que ver con otras culturas. Me gusta mucho la comida, los animales, los idiomas, leer, escuchar música.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Como profesora soy una persona muy responsable y pues al ser una persona curiosa, planteo muchas cuestiones a mis estudiantes, actualmente estoy intentando aprender a ser una mejor profesora y adquirir herramientas que me ayuden a impartir unas mejores clases.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Mi método de enseñanza se acopla de acuerdo al tipo de clase que dicte, por ejemplo si es una clase conversacional le planteo diferentes cuestiones a los estudiantes sobre los diversos temas de conversación que tenemos, hago las correcciones pertinentes en cuanto a pronunciación y tiempo verbal. También enseño imágenes y videos sobre los temas de conversación, recomiendo canciones y películas . Actualmente estoy pensando en iniciar clases para ciertos niveles de Español, sin embargo quiero formarme un poco más al respecto.

pro_course_detail.title: PRACTICA CONVERSACIONAL
pro_course_detail.description: Esta clase está dirigida a las personas que quieran practicar su español y por medio de esto mejorar su destreza y confianza a la hora de hablar.  En esta clase se hablara de temas espontáneos o predeterminados con anterioridad.

pro_course_detail.title: CLASE DE REFUERZO
pro_course_detail.description: Esta clase tiene el objetivo de enfocarse en un área concreta que el estudiante quiera reforzar, desde aspectos gramaticales, pronunciación y redacción, por lo cual, el estudiante deberá comunicar con anticipación qué desea reforzar

teacher_info.intro:
Soy una chica emprendedora Costarricense, disfruto de la naturaleza y los animales, mis hobbies son pintar y dibujar, soy amante de la música y el arte.
Me gusta interactuar y ayudar a las personas, soy una persona muy sociable, humilde, honesta y tolerante.
teacher_info.about_me:
Soy una chica emprendedora Costarricense, disfruto de la naturaleza y los animales, mis hobbies son pintar y dibujar, soy amante de la música y el arte.
Me gusta interactuar y ayudar a las personas, soy una persona muy sociable, humilde, honesta y tolerante.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Deseo ayudarte a practicar y mejorar tu español, me interesa el avance y la comodidad de mis estudiantes. Soy una profesora muy paciente y amigable, estaré encantada de resolver tus dudas y practicar contigo!
teacher_info.teaching_style: La comodidad de mis estudiantes en mi clase es muy importante para trabajar los temas necesarios, actividades y conversaciones informales son parte de mis clases para que no haya presión durante el aprendizaje, trabajo con un libro de practica adaptado a tu nivel de Español, listo para aprender?

pro_course_detail.title: Conversemos
pro_course_detail.description: Estaré encantada de conversar contigo de manera informal y ayudarte a aprender o mejorar temas básicos para iniciar, desarrollar y finalizar una conversación en español sin ningún problema!

pro_course_detail.title: El español de Costa Rica
pro_course_detail.description: Aprende costarriqueñismos a los que te enfrentarás si planeas vivir o vacacionar en Costa Rica, te ayudaré a entender la manera de hablar de nosotros los costarricenses, no es tan complicado!

teacher_info.intro:
Hi there! Thank you for taking the time to look into me!
My name is Paulina, everybody calls me Pau. I'm 24 years old and I'm from Venezuela but I reside in Mexico. I study marketing and work creating content for social networks and giving language classes.
I like to travel  and meeting neww people and culture. Also on weekends I go hiking with my dog.

Hola! Gracias por tomarte el tiempo para ver mi perfil
Me puedes llamar Pau. Tengo 24 años, soy de Venezuela pero vivo en Mexico. Estudio mercadotecnia y mi trabajo es crear contenido para redes sociales y dar clases de idiomas.
Me gusta viajar y conocer gente nueva y su cultura- Los fines de semana hago senderismo con mi perrita :)
teacher_info.introduction: Like you, I was a student of a foreign language so I know how it feels not to be a Native speaker but don't be afraid, I can help you. I used to teach to kids and teens English así que me gusta usar métodos donde puedas practicar tu Español y mejorarlo Podemos tener temas de conversaciones de todo tipos: vocabulario, temas como deportes, política, negocios o cultura general Pueda ayudar a todo tipo de estudiante ;)
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi there! Thank you for taking the time to look into me!
My name is Paulina, everybody calls me Pau. I'm 24 years old and I'm from Venezuela but I reside in Mexico. I study marketing and work creating content for social networks and giving language classes.
I like to travel  and meeting neww people and culture. Also on weekends I go hiking with my dog.

Hola! Gracias por tomarte el tiempo para ver mi perfil
Me puedes llamar Pau. Tengo 24 años, soy de Venezuela pero vivo en Mexico. Estudio mercadotecnia y mi trabajo es crear contenido para redes sociales y dar clases de idiomas.
Me gusta viajar y conocer gente nueva y su cultura- Los fines de semana hago senderismo con mi perrita :)
teacher_info.about_teacher:
As a tutor I like to listen to the student and mainly take into account their objectives in a medium and long term period. I have worked with children and adults. If you are learning from 0, I will be able to explain you in English.
I know that learning a language can sometimes be difficult and we make mistakes, that's why I am patient and empathetic :)

Como tutora me gusta escuchar al estudiante y principalmente tener en cuenta sus objetivos en un periodo de mediano y largo plazo. He trabajado con niños y adultos. Si estas aprendiendo desde 0, podré explicarte en inglés. 
Se que aprender un idioma a veces puede ser dificil y llegamos a cometer errores, por eso soy paciente y empatica :)
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I like to teach in the way where the student feels comfortable. Each lesson and the material used is adapted to your preferences and needs. To make the most of class time, I like to implement creativity, sentence completion, songs, conversations and make the class as dynamic as possible.

Me gusta enseñar en la forma donde el alumno se sienta comodo. Cada tutoria y el material utilizado, se adapta a tus preferencias y necesidade. Para aprovechar  al maximo el tiempo de la clase, me gusta implementar la creatividad, completacion de oraciones, canciones, conversaciones y hacer la clase lo más dinamica posible.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversación informal
pro_course_detail.description: Hablemos sobre temas interesantes para practicar tu español o sobre un tema que quieras reforzar. Acompañado de ejercicios sencillos.

pro_course_detail.title: Beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
Dirigido para: niños, adolescentes y jovenes.
Repaso y aprendizaje de vocabulario básico y lectura.
Uso de verbos regulares e irregulares

pro_course_detail.title: Specific Learning
pro_course_detail.description:
Aclaración y tutorias sobre un tema en especifico.
Repaso de conocimiento mediante ejercicios teoricos y practicos.

If you need to communicate for work purposes, have family or friends that speak Spanish, or you’re planning to travel to a Hispanic country, you’ve gotten to the correct place!

Hope to see you soon.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello everyone. My name is Lidia, and I'm from Madrid, Spain. 
I am a certified Spanish teacher and DELE examiner.  At the moment, I am taking a leave of absence from my job (social worker in emergency services) to dedicate myself to my two great passions: traveling and teaching. I presently have no fixed residence, as I am travelling. 
I understand how difficult it is to learn a new language, since I have also been a student (I speak English and Italian). I am an outgoing and dynamic person, so I can guarantee you won’t get bored and you will learn Spanish in a fun and relaxed environment.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello everyone. My name is Lidia, and I'm from Madrid, Spain. 
I am a certified Spanish teacher and DELE examiner.  At the moment, I am taking a leave of absence from my job (social worker in emergency services) to dedicate myself to my two great passions: traveling and teaching. I presently have no fixed residence, as I am travelling. 
I understand how difficult it is to learn a new language, since I have also been a student (I speak English and Italian). I am an outgoing and dynamic person, so I can guarantee you won’t get bored and you will learn Spanish in a fun and relaxed environment.
teacher_info.about_teacher: We are going to talk about various topics in a relaxed environment. I'll correct your mistakes and teach you useful expressions , phrases.and grammar. I'll make suggestion on how to make your Spanish sound more natural. My  conversation classes are for people that are already studying Spanish, whether at school or studying on your own, ideally for students A2 upwards. We can also adjust the lesson to your specific needs, such as helping you for an exam or a job interview. I plan my sessions, taking into account your needs and your interests. We will speak Spanish from the first lesson and English or Italian would be used only for clarifications. Only for adults .
teacher_info.teaching_style: My methodology is based on the communicative approach. I always take into consideration the motivation and interests of the student. I will present the contents in situations where the use of the language is useful and meaningful with exercises based on tasks, oral interaction and written practice.

exp_info.description: I worked as volunteer teaching Spanish to asylum seekers and emigrants who just arrived to Spain without  any knowledge of Spanish . I taught them  not just Spanish, but also how to apply to benefits, fill up forms and move around Madrid.

edu_info.description: Curso de acreditación como examinadora oficial DELE

cert_info.description: This course provides me the knowledge and the basis and how to teach a class , specifically on line. allowing me to make the most of out time and the resources available
cert_info.certificate: Teaching Spanish as a second language
DELE
Recommendation letter

cert_info.description: Certificado acreditado por Instituto Cervantes. He aprendido como crear mis propios materiales didácticos,  analizar los materiales ya existentes y desarrollar clases centradas en los intereses individuales. Una parte muy importante del curso ha sido la gramática, ya que lo he completado con un curso de 80 horas sobre gramática española que me ha permitido aprender el funcionamiento de la misma y las reglas , siendo capaz de transmitir esta información de una manera clara, concisa y concreta.
cert_info.certificate: Metodología Enseñzanza de Español ELE

pro_course_detail.title: Let's speak Spanish!
pro_course_detail.description:
CONTACT ME BEFORE BOOKING A CLASS :-)
These are free conversation classes. We will  have a conversation in Spanish, about different topics . 
(Don't worry, I ll make sure it feels natural and not forced, so you can feel like you are actually having a real conversation instead of going through a list of topics )
These classes are designed to maintain your level, improve your fluency, gain vocabulary and learn how to create a more cohesive speech. Only for adults. Starting at A2 level. Let's go !

*please be aware that 60 min lessons are between 55 and 57 min  due to the fact that nature calls :)


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hola! ¿Cómo estás?
Tendremos una conversación en español y trabajaremos juntos para mejorar tu vocabulario, escucha, pronunciación y fluidez. ¡Vamos! Solo para adultos . Nivel minimo A2

pro_course_detail.title: Let's learn and improve through articles, videos  and much more!…
pro_course_detail.description:
CONTACT ME BEFORE BOOKING A CLASS :-)
This class is for people who want to improve their Spanish with a big focus on speaking but don't want structured classes nor free conversation. This category is 100 % conversation based on articles, videos, audios and  more. These lessons are  designed to take you out of your comfort zone and will push you to speak  about different topics. We will work on pronunciation, vocabulary, grammar structures and how to make you sound more natural.  Materials will be provided and I’ll send them to you prior to the lesson. 
Feel free to suggest topics and I‘ll prepare them. 
 
*****Adults only.****If you have any questions don’t hesitate to contact me.

**please be aware that 60 min lessons are between 55 and 57 min  due to the fact that nature calls :)

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish lessons
pro_course_detail.description:
CONTACT ME BEFORE BOOKING A CLASS :-)
These are structured lessons. We will use books and my own materials.  By following a structure we will ensure that you will learn  everything according to your level and that you will progress to the next level.  This category is for people  who want a more structured format
*** if you are an absolute beginner this category is for you.  Be very welcome and enjoy the process of learning a new language  :)

**please be aware that 60 min lessons are between 55 and 57 min  due to the fact that nature calls :)

pro_course_detail.title: Preparación DELE
pro_course_detail.description:
CONTACT ME BEFORE BOOKING A CLASS :-)
Esta categoría es para alumnos que quieren prepararse  para obtener el certificado DELE.  

¿ Cómo funciona?

En la primera clase trabajaremos sobre el formato del examen, ya que debes adaptar tus conocimientos al formato específico. Veremos cada apartado en detalle, cómo se lleva a cabo el examen , tiempo y  criterios de evaluación  entre otros. Al finalizar la clase te enviaré un modelo antiguo de examen para que realices  fuera de clase y así podré evaluar tus puntos fuertes  y las áreas que necesitan más trabajo. 

Posteriormente trabajaremos las cuatro partes del examen siguiendo el orden oficial. 
comprensión de lectura
comprensión auditiva
expresión e interacción escrita
expresión e interacción oral

La tarea de expresión e interacción escrita la realizarás fuera de clase , yo te proporcionaré feedback y trabajaremos sobre los errores en clase. 
Según mi experiencia el mayor reto es la interacción oral y escrita , por lo que dedicaremos más tiempo a esta parte del examen .Producirás textos que podrás usar como modelo para el examen oficial. 
Cada parte del examen será complementada con ejercicios específicos cuando sea necesario. 

¿ Por qué realizar un curso de preparación a los exámenes DELE   ?

-Porque estas clases  ayudan a tener un objetivo y crean la motivación para trabajar y aprender.
-Porque al tratarse de un examen específico necesitas adaptar tu conocimiento al formato del examen.
-Trabajaremos las cuatro destrezas poniendo especial interés en las áreas más problemáticas. 
-Porque soy examinadora oficial del Instituto Cervantes de exámenes DELE  y te guiaré a lo largo de todo el proceso.

***Se trata de un curso intensivo por lo que esta diseñado para llevarse a cabo entre 5 y 10 lecciones dependiendo del estudiante y de la duración  escogida para las clases.

teacher_info.intro:
✴Do you want to talk in Spanish from the first lesson? ✅
Do you want to improve your Spanish? ✅
Do you want to prepare your DELE exam with a professional DELE examiner? ✅
Lessons tailored to your specific needs!✴
To know more, check out my profile
teacher_info.introduction:
Maybe you can write, but it´s hard to understand someone in Spanish. Maybe you can speak but your writing is not good. Or maybe you can understand what you read, but you don´t feel comfortable talking.  I´m here to help you!  

ABOUT ME

This isn´t my hobby, this is my full time job. I´m a native speaking Spanish teacher with a Master Degree in Teaching Spanish as a Foreigner Language. I have been teaching Spanish  since 2009; I´ve worked in 2 universities, academies and Instituto Cervantes for 6 years, where I´ve worked with adults, children, teenegers and I´ve taught Spanish for Business courses. For many years I was a language student, so I know how does it feel to learn a new language.

LESSONS

My lessons are very communicative and tailored to individual needs. Before every lesson I will send you a document with the objectives of the lesson, you’ll be always aware about your learning. We will also work with another document that works as a blackboard. We both can edit it, and then you can keep it and use it and review it when you want to. I’ll always keep in mind your interests and objectives while preparing the material so besides learning Spanish, you will enjoy the lessons.
You will improve your confidence so you will feel comfortable to talk in Spanish and you will improve all your skills (writing, listening, speaking and reading).

MATERIAL

You don´t have to buy any material, I provide you studying materials among many that suit you better to achieve your goals in the Spanish language. I´m also a material designer so I will design anything you need to help you to learn Spanish.

I´m looking forward to meet you and start with you your Spanish project!

CANCELLATION POLICY
- Cancellation and rescheduling have to be agreed upon 24 hours before lesson time. 
Otherwise the lesson has to be paid.

DURATION OF LESSONS
1 hour lesson - 55 mins

pro_course_detail.title: General Spanish (All levels)
pro_course_detail.description:
We will start form the very beginning, but trying to do the lesson just in Spanish from the first day.

We will work on differents skills (listening, writing, reading, speaking...), or if you want to focus just in one skilll, we will work on it! 

I use several materials that I will send  you before every class.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversación en español
pro_course_detail.description:
Para estudiantes con un nivel intermedio o avanzado que quieran mejorar la expresión oral. Realizaremos diferentes actividades de conversación con el objetivo de mejorar la lengua y trabajar los errores.

Además, después de cada clase  te enviaré un documento con los aspectos trabajados y los que hay que mejorar.

Yo te enviaré todo el material necesario, ¡tú solo tienes que estar preparado para hablar en español!

pro_course_detail.title: Preparación a los exámenes DELE
pro_course_detail.description:
Curso especializado en la preparación a los exámenes oficiales DELE.
Trabajaremos y prepararemos todas las pruebas que se realizan en el examen: expresión oral y escrita y comprensión oral y auditiva.

pro_course_detail.title: Tutorías individuales
pro_course_detail.description: Para estudiantes que quieres trabajar uno o varios aspectos concretos de la lengua. Estas clases son para estudiantes que ya tengan, al menos, un nivel a2.

pro_course_detail.title: El subjuntivo
pro_course_detail.description: Diferentes tipos de ejercicios para practicar el subjuntivo. Antes de contratar el curso, es necesario hablar con la profesora y tener, al menos, un nivel B1 o B2

teacher_info.intro: 我是一个大学生，能帮你理解并征服西班牙语。我认为，如果更多人懂更多语言，我们全世界的人都会得到利益。因此我要更你一起学西班牙语，制造更多文化交流的机会。我们用彼此的语言表达我们的思想是理解对方的第一步，也是最重要的一步。Mi nombre es Ezequiel! Estudio historia y me encantaría ayudarte a aprender español. Creo que cuanta más gente hable más idiomas, todos los aspectos del mundo, desde el académico al artístico pueden enriquecerse de gran manera. Me gusta pensar que cada vez que enseño una palabra a un alumno esa palabra será utilizada para aprender y expresar ideas que pueden cambiar el mundo en el que vivimos. Espero que sea así y que puedas usar tu nuevo idioma para hacer un mundo mejor, más interesante y bello!
teacher_info.short_signature: 认真帮你达到你的目标的老师！！！
teacher_info.about_me: 我是一个大学生，能帮你理解并征服西班牙语。我认为，如果更多人懂更多语言，我们全世界的人都会得到利益。因此我要更你一起学西班牙语，制造更多文化交流的机会。我们用彼此的语言表达我们的思想是理解对方的第一步，也是最重要的一步。Mi nombre es Ezequiel! Estudio historia y me encantaría ayudarte a aprender español. Creo que cuanta más gente hable más idiomas, todos los aspectos del mundo, desde el académico al artístico pueden enriquecerse de gran manera. Me gusta pensar que cada vez que enseño una palabra a un alumno esa palabra será utilizada para aprender y expresar ideas que pueden cambiar el mundo en el que vivimos. Espero que sea así y que puedas usar tu nuevo idioma para hacer un mundo mejor, más interesante y bello!
teacher_info.about_teacher: 我比较严格，但是这不是说我会骂你什么的😁。我会赶你做作业，但是你也不会觉得很累。我会按照你的水平和兴趣制造或找到一些材料，来增加你对西班牙语的兴趣。我不会让你对西班牙语的兴趣冷下来。Soy más bien exigente, pero eso no significa que sea duro ni que mis clases no sean llevables. Me enfoco en prestarle atención a mis alumnos y seguirlos en sus intereses, corregir sus errores y hacerlos sentirse más cómodos a la hora de utilizar lo aprendido. Tengo mucha paciencia y genero feedback con mis alumnos todos los días, de manera de generarles un "ambiente" hispanoparlante y empujarlos hacia el dominio del idioma.
teacher_info.teaching_style: 我运用的是隔间重复技巧，每天发给你很少数量的作业，包括填空、造句、录音你的发音等在内。如果你的水平比较高我会帮你阅读较复杂的文章。我的课很动感、活力。Utilizo el método de repetición espaciada, envió tarea para ser devuelta diariamente en pequeñas cantidades, pueden enviarme audios con su pronunciación. Para los niveles más avanzados los ayudo con sus lecturas y les envío materiales relacionados con sus intereses para leer y dominarlos juntos. Las clases son dinámicas y enfocadas en poder utilizar el idioma de una manera natural.

pro_course_detail.title: Clases de gramática y vocabulario de español
pro_course_detail.description: 我们会仔细的学会西语的语法点、词汇和发音。上课后我会颁布给你作业并发给你课外的参考文献。 Las clases están orientadas al estudio de gramática y vocabulario, incluidas excepciones y distintos usos. Luego de la clase te enviaré tarea y materiales aparte.

teacher_info.intro: I'm glad to help people acquire a new language for their different purposes. I enjoy learning other languages too, so I understand the different approaches different people can take. I've got experience living and working abroad with a big variety of people, teaching them general English and Spanish, and also Technical Spanish and Business English. I have also prepared students to pass international tests like DELE C1, B2 and B1 (Spanish proficiency test) and PET, KET and FCE, individually and in groups, abroad as well as in my country. I get easily adapted to people's needs and it's rewarding to be part of their development.. Count on me for everything you need. See you all soon.
teacher_info.about_me: I'm glad to help people acquire a new language for their different purposes. I enjoy learning other languages too, so I understand the different approaches different people can take. I've got experience living and working abroad with a big variety of people, teaching them general English and Spanish, and also Technical Spanish and Business English. I have also prepared students to pass international tests like DELE C1, B2 and B1 (Spanish proficiency test) and PET, KET and FCE, individually and in groups, abroad as well as in my country. I get easily adapted to people's needs and it's rewarding to be part of their development.. Count on me for everything you need. See you all soon.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I graduated from Universidad de Concepcion, Chile. There I studied a B.A. in English Teaching, which also provided me a Teaching License. Two years after graduating I entered a post-graduate programme in Spanish Teaching as a Foreign Language. I worked for three years in Chile in universities and language schools, and from 2010 to 2016 I lived and worked in Moscow, Russia, There I was an English and Spanish teacher in language schools and a private tutor in both languages. In 2015 I started teaching online through a Russian agency that allowed me to change the way in which I taught my private lessons. I already have 3 years of experience teaching online, but only with Russian students.
teacher_info.teaching_style: My lessons are based on topics, because it influences the communicative activities we will develop during the class. Depending on the level of the student, the topics can include more in-depth activities and language contents. In initial levels I try to follow a more strict use of language functions, in order to build a learning structure. In more advanced levels, I try to give my students more freedom to use the previous contents learnt in the course, emphasizing effective communication, or the completion of specific objectives.

edu_info.major: Spanish Teaching as a Foreign Language

cert_info.certificate: Teaching License

pro_course_detail.title: General English Course
pro_course_detail.description: English course focused in a balanced development of skills in order to reach the desired levels. It's customized according to the students needs but reaching the objectives and functions required for each level.

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Spanish Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description: Communicative practice in Spanish, in which I can help you develop different aspects of your speaking skills, as well as understanding cultural issues involved in communication. It's a useful lesson for improving your vocabulary and complex structures used in specific contexts.

pro_course_detail.title: Informal English Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description: Communicative practice in English, in which I can help you develop different aspects of your speaking skills, as well as understand cultural issues relevant in communication. It's a useful lesson for improving your vocabulary and complex structures used in specific contexts.

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish Course
pro_course_detail.description: The courses are designed from levels A1 to C2. The appropriate level is assessed along with the student, in order to fulfill his/her requirements. It covers a wide range of contents and activities in order to acquire as many language functions as possible

teacher_info.intro: Hola! soy Karol, mi lengua nativa es el español y actualmente vivo en Colombia, me encanta enseñar y especialmente compartir mis conocimientos acerca de este hermoso idioma. Actualmente estoy estudiando pedagogía, eso ayuda a buscar distintos métodos de enseñanza, ya que en mis prácticas analizó, desarrolló y evaluó los procesos del estudiante
teacher_info.about_me: Hola! soy Karol, mi lengua nativa es el español y actualmente vivo en Colombia, me encanta enseñar y especialmente compartir mis conocimientos acerca de este hermoso idioma. Actualmente estoy estudiando pedagogía, eso ayuda a buscar distintos métodos de enseñanza, ya que en mis prácticas analizó, desarrolló y evaluó los procesos del estudiante
teacher_info.about_teacher: Me gusta conocer la gente y sus culturas, ya que me da la posibilidad de enseñar un idioma tan bonito cómo lo es el español
teacher_info.teaching_style: Estoy muy feliz de poder acompañarte en tu proceso de aprendizaje. Mis clases son dinámicas, creativas y personalizadas y el objetivo será mejorar tu nivel de español, enfocándonos en tus necesidades e intereses

cert_info.description: Se necesita estudiar pedagogia para ser profesor de primaria
cert_info.certificate: Normalista Superior

pro_course_detail.title: Práctica de conversación
pro_course_detail.description:
¡Hola!
Clase que te enseñara el idioma español mediante conversaciones y mi objetivo es ayudarte a practicar tu expresión oral y comprensión auditiva.
El español es un idioma muy bonito y con gran cantidad de ventajas, hablarás con fluidez con lecciones adaptadas a tus necesidades especialmente serán divertidas

pro_course_detail.title: Gramatica
pro_course_detail.description: Usaremos distintos materiales para que el estudiante se afiance y pueda aprender de forma organizada las palabras en las oraciones

pro_course_detail.title: Compresión Auditiva
pro_course_detail.description: Haré que tu aprendizaje sea fácil y sencillo, permíteme aportar para que logres tu meta, me fascina poder conocer todo tipo de persona y sus necesidades, enseñar ha sido parte de mi vida

teacher_info.intro:
Hi, I'm Gino Alejandro, a 34 years old Peruvian-Italian, passionate about languages, hospitality, sports and cinema. I've a bachelor's degree in Tourism Economics and an MBA.

I grew up in Peru, where I studied English and Italian, before moving to Rome when I turned 18. I also lived in Barcelona for an Erasmus program. Faced with classes in Catalan, I couldn't resist signing up for a Catalan language class.

It's been a challenging yet rewarding journey to move overseas. My curiosity, passion for cultures and languages I speak opened doors for me in hospitality (hotels & restaurants), travel agencies, and clothing stores, combining additional interests: travel and human interactions.
teacher_info.short_signature: I'm Gino and I would like to accompany you in this beautiful journey of learning languages!
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi, I'm Gino Alejandro, a 34 years old Peruvian-Italian, passionate about languages, hospitality, sports and cinema. I've a bachelor's degree in Tourism Economics and an MBA.

I grew up in Peru, where I studied English and Italian, before moving to Rome when I turned 18. I also lived in Barcelona for an Erasmus program. Faced with classes in Catalan, I couldn't resist signing up for a Catalan language class.

It's been a challenging yet rewarding journey to move overseas. My curiosity, passion for cultures and languages I speak opened doors for me in hospitality (hotels & restaurants), travel agencies, and clothing stores, combining additional interests: travel and human interactions.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Through tailor-made classes, my students breathe every aspect of the languages and their cultures. I enjoy sharing insights and experience so people may fall in love with Italian, Peruvian and Spanish cultures.

I'm sure that conversation is the key to excel in languages, although I believe that grammar does play an important part in the framework as a guide through this amazing journey.

I believe we're a little bit of every person we encounter in our lives - the same occurs with languages. By improving, we dress the part and cultivate in-depth knowledge to open doors to new experiences and opportunities in a way that only language learning provides. It widens our horizons and worldviews.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I've been teaching Spanish and English on and off for several years to family and friends. I've recently started teaching Italian to expats living in Rome as I've lived first-hand the struggles of learning new languages and getting used to totally different lifestyles. That's why I would like to help you along the way through the local way of living, as a "culture-shock-absorber": I'll be your guide, I'm constantly discovering new places and ways to travel around.

I know that every person uniquely approaches language learning, so classes are tailor-made, and I'm patient and empathetic. We can choose beforehand specific topics or aspects you want to talk about.

Are you ready?

pro_course_detail.title: Let's have a talk as if we were having an espresso in a cozy bar located in a narrow street of Rome City Center🗣☕️🍕
pro_course_detail.description:
I have a dream and that is to give the possibility to all my students to actually breathe every single aspect of the languages I teach and the cultures involved. I have hosted many friends and relatives in Rome and they all thanked me for allowing them to see Rome from another perspective. 

I am sure that conversation is the main factor to excel in your language skills but i believe that grammar rules are also very important to have a framework as a guide to go through this amazing journey.

I believe we are a little bit of every single person we encounter in our life and the same occurs with languages. The more and the better we get to know them, the more we are able to  have an in-depth knowledge of the world we live in in order to widen our horizons and our views.

pro_course_detail.title: Let's have a talk as if we were having an espresso in a cozy bar located in a narrow street of Rome City Center🗣☕️🍕
pro_course_detail.description:
I have a dream and that is to give the possibility to all my students to actually breathe every single aspect of the languages I teach and the cultures involved. I have hosted many friends and relatives in Rome and they all thanked me for allowing them to see Rome from another perspective.

I am sure that conversation is the main factor to excel in your language skills but i believe that grammar rules are also very important to have a framework as a guide to go through this amazing journey.

I believe we are a little bit of every single person we encounter in our life and the same occurs with languages. The more and the better we get to know them, the more we are able to  have an in-depth knowledge of the world we live in in order to widen our horizons and our views.

teacher_info.intro:
Hola Guerrero! Greetings warrior! If you are here, it means that you are ready to take by storm the citadel called "Español". Well, I'll guide you!

For half a century of my life, I managed to live in Estonia, Argentina and Norway. And in each country I had to learn a new language. At first, everything seems incredibly complex and confusing. A pile of rules and the absurdity of pronunciation.

But gradually I managed to highlight some leading lights, following which you can learn the language quickly and without unnecessary loss of nerve cells. Now, after getting my professional education, I am ready to share it with you.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hola Guerrero! Greetings warrior! If you are here, it means that you are ready to take by storm the citadel called "Español". Well, I'll guide you!

For half a century of my life, I managed to live in Estonia, Argentina and Norway. And in each country I had to learn a new language. At first, everything seems incredibly complex and confusing. A pile of rules and the absurdity of pronunciation.

But gradually I managed to highlight some leading lights, following which you can learn the language quickly and without unnecessary loss of nerve cells. Now, after getting my professional education, I am ready to share it with you.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
My goal in teaching is to help a person begin to speak Spanish, to make Spanish a real communication tool.

I will not load with grammar rules, but I will include it carefully into the lesson so that you will speak correctly. I will teach "real" Spanish, speaking which you will have an extraordinary pleasure.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Successful language learning is based on four “whales” - reading, writing, listening and communicating / speaking. In my lessons, I try to ensure that my students develop all those skills. I really strive to ensure that the student has no fear of a foreign language, and that each lesson is inspiring and brings only positive emotions.

pro_course_detail.title: Español General, Conversación y gramática
pro_course_detail.description:
On this lesson, you will improve your spoken Spanish. Together we will train the pronunciation of each word, if desired, we can also practice reading skills. Finally, we will improve speaking by gradually making it faster and more natural. I have a variety of study tools, a whiteboard, special songs to memorize, books, podcasts, different exercises, etc. My main idea is to create a dynamic and engaging lesson that combines both short and long term. goals. Come and try it! 

На этом занятии вы улучшите ваш разговорный испанский. Вместе мы отработаем произношение каждого слова, при желании сможем также заняться навыками чтения. И наконец, мы будем улучшить устную речь, постепенно делая ее быстрой и естественной. У меня есть различные учебные инструменты, доска, специальные песни для запоминания, книги, подкасты, различные упражнения и т. Д. Моя основная идея состоит в том, чтобы у нас получился динамичный и увлекательный урок, соединяющий в себе как краткосрочные, так и долгосрочные цели. Приходи!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversación / Разговорная практика
pro_course_detail.description:
On these lessons you will be able to improve your pronunciation. Progress will be visible in just a few lessons. The goal is to make your speech similar to native speaker. We will of course talk a lot, but apart from that we will also work on listening exercises that have a huge impact on pronunciation. Don't worry, the speed and rhythm of the lesson will be tailored to your preference. 

На этоих занятиях вы сможете улучшить свое произношение. Прогресс будет виден уже через несколько уроков. Цель - сделать вашу речь максимально похожей на то, как говорят носители языка. Мы, конечно же, будем много разговаривать, но помимо этого также поработаем с упражнениями на слушание, которые оказывают огромное влияние на произношение. Не переживайте, скорость и ритм урока будут адаптированы под ваши предпочтения.

pro_course_detail.title: Español para niños
pro_course_detail.description:
On these lesson I will help with school program, teach from the very beginning or fill gaps in grammar.

На этих уроках я смогу помочь со школьной программой, научить испанскому с нуля или заполнить пробелы в грамматике.
